properties.areaDesc: Lowndes, AL; Dallas, AL; Autauga, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 8:35AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Alabama River At R.F. Henry Lock and Dam Affecting Autauga...Dallas
and Lowndes Counties.

.Heavy rainfall of 2 to 3 inches has occurred over the past 24 hours
over the Alabama River basin. This is producing rises along the river
...and a flood warning is now in effect for the R.F. Henry Lock and
Dam. Minor flooding of the surrounding low-lying areas is now expected
to begin occurring by Thursday.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Alabama River At R.F. Henry Lock and Dam.
* from Thursday afternoon until further notice...or until the Warning
is cancelled.
* At  8:00 AM Tuesday The stage Was 115.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 122 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Thursday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 123.9 feet by early Friday afternoon.
* Impact...At 122 feet...Flooding of agricultural lands begins.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Wednesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
